New Records: Steph Curry scored 17 points, dished out 10 assists, and pulled down nine rebounds on 40% shooting, showing a near triple-double performance.
Key Match Events: The Golden State Warriors dominated the Portland Trail Blazers with a 139-104 win in their season opener.
Pre-Game Insights: Steph Curry expressed that despite the offseason changes, the Warriors are still focused on chasing another championship.
Post-Match Reflections: The Warriors are expected to execute another “significant” trade during the 2024-25 season to strengthen the team.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Warriors' season opener marked the first regular-season game without Klay Thompson since drafting him in 2011.
Others: Buddy Hield added 22 points off the bench for the Warriors, while Moses Moody, Trayce Jackson-Davis, and Jonathan Kuminga added 15, 14, and 10 markers, respectively.
